mapper.insert: insert into Alarm (STCD, ItemID, Time, Name, Value, Type, Memo) values (#{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{itemID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select STCD, ItemID, Time, Name, Value, Type, Memo from Alarm
